titleStmt.title: The Duke of Buckingham his speech to the King in Parliament Aprill 4. 1628.
titleStmt.author: Buckingham, George Villiers, Duke of, 1592-1628.

notesStmt.note: Speech made at the Council-table expressing gratification at the improved relations betweeen king and parliament after the granting of the five subsidies.--Cf. Rushworth, J. Historical collections. London, 1721. v. 1, p. 525.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
